description: We can't go past a well-seasoned chicken schnitzel. Chives, cheese and peri peri sauce make all the difference to this crispy dish atop mango slaw.
keywords: Cheat's Chicken Schnitzel With Mango Slaw
name: Cheat's Chicken Schnitzel With Mango Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 5 ml extra virgin olive oil spray

recipeInstructions.text: Serve schnitzels with mango slaw and remaining lime, cut into wedges.
